dataIdInfo.idAbs: Download a file from AWS S3 to local disk.

Consts.useLimit: Using this tool with Amazon Web Services requires an Amazon Web Services account, costs will be incurred to that account per the usage of this tool with it.

dataIdInfo.idCredit: Please refer to Marwa Mabrouk: mmabrouk@esri.com for questions and feedback.

tool.name: S3Download

param.name: awskey
param.dialogReference:
AWS Key

Please refer to http://docs.aws.amazon.com/general/latest/gr/getting-aws-sec-creds.html

you will find it under Access keys (access key ID and secret access key)

param.name: awssecretkey
param.dialogReference:
AWS Secret Key

Please refer to http://docs.aws.amazon.com/general/latest/gr/getting-aws-sec-creds.html

you will find it under Access keys (access key ID and secret access key)

param.name: bucketname
param.dialogReference:
The main root direcotry in S3.

For more information about S3, please refer to: http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonS3/latest/gsg/GetStartedWithS3.html

param.name: filename
param.dialogReference:
The path to the filename under the root directory (bucket) in S3.

For more information about S3, please refer to: http://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonS3/latest/gsg/GetStartedWithS3.html

param.name: filepath
param.dialogReference: The path to the local directory where the file from S3 will be downloaded.

tool.summary: Download a file from AWS S3 to local disk.
tool.usage: Select an S3 bucket, then select a file under this bucket. Then define the local path to download the file to.
